title: One-Pot Pesto Pasta
instructions:
Boil pasta until al dente.
Reserve 1/4 cup pasta water.
Stir pesto into the hot pasta.
Add pasta water to adjust consistency.
Serve warm with parmesan.

title: Garlic Butter Chicken
instructions:
Season chicken with salt and pepper.
Sear in a skillet until golden.
Add garlic and butter, reduce heat.
Simmer until chicken reaches 165°F.
Serve with rice or vegetables.

title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
instructions:
Heat oil in a pan.
Add broccoli, carrots, peppers, and onions.
Cook on high heat for 5–7 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil.
Serve immediately over rice.

title: Classic French Toast
instructions:
Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla.
Dip bread slices into the mixture.
Cook on medium heat until golden on both sides.
Serve with syrup and powdered sugar.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions:
Brown ground beef in a skillet.
Add taco seasoning and water.
Simmer until thickened.
Warm tortillas.
Assemble with lettuce, cheese, salsa, and beef.
